name: GetResponse Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when GetResponse events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 GetResponse Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when GetResponse events occur

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Customer Subscribed (值: subscribe) - Receive notifications when a customer is subscribed to a list
Customer Unsubscribed (值: unsubscribe) - Receive notifications when a customer is unsubscribed from a list
Email Clicked (值: click) - Receive notifications when a email is clicked
Email Opened (值: open) - Receive notifications when a email is opened
Survey Submitted (值: survey) - Receive notifications when a survey is submitted

listIds.name: listIds
listIds.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
listIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: []

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: delete (值: None) - Whether to delete the current subscription
